# 6.0 Docs

- [Breaking change: CreateEncryptor methods throw exception for incorrect feedback size](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/cryptography/6.0/cfb-mode-feedback-size-exception.md): Learn about the breaking change in .NET 6 where the `CreateEncryptor` and `CreateDecryptor` methods for `AesCng` and `TripleDESCng` throw an exception for an incorrect feedback size when used with a persisted key for CFB mode.
